attributes.action: Make it law that all dogs to be kept on a lead when out
attributes.additional_details:
To make it law 
After many times of animals being hurt a people  and after the poor seal being hurt by a dog being off the lead this needs to stop
attributes.background: To many people animals are getting hert because  dogs are aload to walk off the lead it should be law that all dogs are to be kept on a lead while out for a walk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569074
